#summary jquery ui map v.3 API

= Dependencies =

  * jquery.core 
  * jquery.ui.core.js
  * jquery.ui.widget.js

  OR
  
  * jquery.core 
  * jquery.mobile 

= Overview =

Make the selected element a Google map.

{{{
$(function() {				
    $('#map_canvas').gmap();
});
}}}

All properties in the [http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#MapOptions MapOption] object can be set and retrieved by

{{{
//getter
var zoom= $('#map_canvas').gmap('option', 'zoom');
//setter
$('#map_canvas').gmap('option', 'zoom', 7);
}}}

= API version 3.0 =

== jquery.ui.map core ==

===Constructor===

|| *Constructor* || *Return value* || *Description* || 
|| gmap(opts?:[http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#MapOptions MapOptions]) || $([http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#Map Map]) || Creates a new map. MapOptions is extended with an optional callback method, i.e. { 'callback':function() { } }, invoked after the map has been loaded || 

===Methods===

|| *Method* || *Return value* || *Description* ||
|| addBounds([http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#LatLng LatLng]) || none || Adds a bound to the existing boundaries. ||
|| addControl(panel:jquery/node/string, position:[http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#ControlPosition ControlPosition]) || none || Creates a control from the given div panel on the map. ||
|| addMarker(opts?:[http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#MarkerOptions MarkerOptions], callback?:function(map:[http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#Map Map], marker:[http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#Marker Marker])) || $([http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#Marker Marker])  || Creates a marker on the map. MarkerOptions is extended with a bounds property ('bounds':boolean) to add boundaries  ||
|| addInfoWindow(opts:[http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#InfoWindowOptions InfoWindowOptions], callback?:function(infowindow:[http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#InfoWindow InfoWindow])) || $([http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#InfoWindow InfoWindow]) || Creates an info window bound to the marker on the map. ||
|| findMarker (property:string, value:string, callback:function(isFound:boolean, marker:[http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#Marker Marker])) || none || Find marker(s) by property ||
|| getMap() || [http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#Map Map] || Returns the map. ||
|| getMarkers() || Array.[http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#Marker Marker] || Returns an array of markers. ||
|| getInfoWindow() || [http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#InfoWindow InfoWindow] || Returns the [http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#InfoWindow InfoWindow]. ||
|| clearMarkers() || none || Removes all markers on the map. ||
|| destroy() || none || Removes the map functionality. ||

== Events ==

|| *Method* || *Return value* || *Description* ||
|| triggerEvent(type:string) || none || Trigger an event, e.g. 'resize'. ||
|| addEventListener(type:string, callback:function()) || none || Adds a Google event listener or binds a jQuery event||

|| *Event* || *Description* || *Supported elements* || 
|| click || Adds a click event. || [http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#Map Map], [http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#marker Marker]||
|| rightclick || Adds a right click event. || [http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#Map Map], [http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#marker Marker]||
|| dblclick || Adds a double click event. || [http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#Map Map], [http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#marker Marker]||
|| mouseover || Adds a mouse over event. || [http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#Map Map], [http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#marker Marker]||
|| mouseout || Adds a mouse out event. || [http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#Map Map], [http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#marker Marker]||
|| drag || Adds a drag event. || [http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#Map Map], [http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#marker Marker]||
|| dragend || Adds a drag end event. || [http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#Map Map], [http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#marker Marker]||

== jquery.ui.map overlays ==

===Methods===

|| *Method* || *Return value* || *Description* ||
|| loadKML(uniqueIdentifier:string, url:string, opts?:[http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#KmlLayerOptions KmlLayerOptions] ) || none || Adds geographic markup to the map from a KML, KMZ or GeoRSS file that is hosted on a publicly accessible web server. To clear the markers generated from the loadKML method you need to get the service and set the map to null. ||
|| loadFusion(opts:[http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#FusionTablesLayerOptions FusionTablesLayerOptions]) || none || Adds markers from Fusion table. ||
|| loadPanoramio(opts:[http://code.google.com/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#PanoramioLayerOptions PanoramioLayerOptions]) || none || Adds a layer that displays data from Panoramio. ||
|| getOverlay(overlay:string)|| overlay || Returns an overlay by it's name ||

== jquery.ui.map services ==

===Methods===

|| displayDirections(request:[http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#DirectionsRequest DirectionsRequest], opts:[http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#DirectionsRendererOptions DirectionsRendererOptions], callback:function(result:[http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#DirectionsResult DirectionsResult], [http://code.google.com/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#DirectionsStatus DirectionsStatus])) || none || Displays directions on the map and/or in a div panel. ||
|| displayStreetView(panel:jquery/string/node, opts?:[http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#StreetViewPanoramaOptions StreetViewPanoramaOptions]) || none || Displays the panorama for a given LatLng or panorama ID. || 
|| elevationPath(request:[http://code.google.com/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#PathElevationRequest PathElevationRequest], callback:function(result:[http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#ElevationResult ElevationResult], status: [http://code.google.com/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#ElevationStatus ElevationStatus])) || none || Makes an elevation request along a path, where the elevation data are returned as distance-based samples along that path. ||
|| elevationLocations( request:[http://code.google.com/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#PathElevationRequest PathElevationRequest], callback:function(result:[http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#ElevationResult ElevationResult], status:[http://code.google.com/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#ElevationStatus ElevationStatus])) || none || Makes an elevation request for a list of discrete locations. ||
|| search(request:[http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#GeocoderRequest GeocoderRequest], callback:function(result:[http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#GeocoderResult GeocoderResult], status:[http://code.google.com/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#GeocoderStatus GeocoderStatus])) || none || Search addresses and latitude/longitude. ||
|| getService(serviceName:string) || service || Returns a service by name. Supported service names are [http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#DirectionsService DirectionsService], [http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#Geocoder Geocoder], [http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#StreetViewPanorama StreetViewPanorama], [http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#Geocoder Geocoder], [http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#FusionTablesLayer FusionTablesLayer]. KML Layers and RSS Geofeed services can be fetched by the service identifier which the user set.  ||
